name: D.O.G.E.
description:
Welcome Comrade! You have now integrated in the D.O.G.E. Program - Doggy Orbital Gravity Expedition.
Help Comrade Shiba get to the target planet, avoid crashing at all costs and use gravity to your advantage with our new technology - T.O.Y.S. (Transitional Orbit Yelp Stations) and the gravity switch.
